information.name: mkt-queue-sync
information.description: Plugin para sincronizar simple queues con los limites de velocidad establecidos en Ucrm - Very basic plugin based on a Ubiquiti plugin, to synchronize Ucrm Services with Miktotik Simple Queue https://wiki.mikrotik.com/wiki/Manual:Queue
information.author: Franco Johan Gampel - franco@gampel.com.ar

configuration.label: Mikrotik API PORT
configuration.description: Mikrotik API PORT, leave blank if using default

configuration.label: Burst Limit Percentage
configuration.description: Burst Limit Percentage calculated over service Max-Limit / Porcentaje de limite de rafaga calculado sobre el limite maximo del servicio | (If not used configure 0/Si no se utiliza configurar en 0) / Formato de Carga UU/DD (U=Upload D=Download)

configuration.label: Burst Time
configuration.description: Burst Time/Tiempo de Rafaga (If not used configure 1/Si no se utiliza configurar en 1) / Formato de Carga UU/DD (U=Upload D=Download)

configuration.label: Limit At %
configuration.description: Limit at percentage calculated over the max limit Values 1-99 | Porcentaje de Limit At calculado sobre el max-limit valores 1-99 / Formato de Carga UU/DD (U=Upload D=Download)

configuration.label: Add Queue?
configuration.description: Add queue simple in case it does not exist?

configuration.label: UNMS API token
configuration.description: API token created for this plugin in Network section of UNMS only needed when using UNMS v1 | Token API creado para este plugin en la seccion Network de UNMS, solo necesario cuando se utiliza UNMS v1
